itunes:subtitle: Former Navy SEAL Chadd Wright and his best friend Chili join the show to explain why the moon landing was faked, if Bigfoot exists, and whether or not dinosaurs are in the Bible — plus what it’s like to be drowned during Navy SEAL training and Chili expl...
itunes:summary:
Former Navy SEAL Chadd Wright and his best friend Chili join the show to explain why the moon landing was faked, if Bigfoot exists, and whether or not dinosaurs are in the Bible — plus what it’s like to be drowned during Navy SEAL training and Chili explains why black holes aren’t real. WILD SHOW. HOLY SH*T.
